channel.title: Courses on StemLinks
channel.description: Recent content in Courses on StemLinks

item.title: COMP 1805
item.description: Link: DiscreteMath Unit(s): All Description: “Built by Carleton students, for Carleton students. DiscreteMath.ca is an interactive platform built specifically for content from Carleton’s discrete mathematics courses.” [DiscreteMath.ca]

item.title: COMP 2804
item.description: Link: DiscreteMath Unit(s): All Description: “Built by Carleton students, for Carleton students. DiscreteMath.ca is an interactive platform built specifically for content from Carleton’s discrete mathematics courses.” [DiscreteMath.ca] Link: Pat Morin COMP 2804 Unit(s): All Description: Assignments, previous exams, and video lectures.

item.title: ECOR 1045
item.description: Link: Jeff Hanson Statics Course Unit(s): All Description: A playlist that follows the Statics and Dynamics textbook by Hibbler

item.title: SYSC 3600
item.description: Link: Swarthmore Linear Physical Systems Analysis Unit(s): Almost All Description: A website with interactive elements that explains most of the concepts taught in class, with graphs and examples. Contains a map of all the topics and how they are connected with each other. Great for learning Bode plots.

item.title: SYSC 4001
item.description: Link: Tutorialspoint Operating Systems Course Unit(s): All Description: Youtube Playlist that follows Operating Systems Concepts textbook by Silberschatz. Link: Michigan Tech CS4411 Unit(s): All Description: Contains practice homework and exams, follows Operating Systems textbook by Anderson.
